website_summaries.verdict: Cheaper than quite a few other Husqvarna chainsaws, yet it delivers a decent level of power that’s perfect for use around the house or at an acreage.
pros: Maintenance is easier on this model than some others
Adjusting the tension on the chain can be done quickly
Weighs less than many chainsaws, so you can work longer
cons: Doesn’t deliver the power of larger power tools, so cutting jobs will take longer

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not. Buy. This. Saw.
customer_reviews.text: I used this saw 4 hours total and it is toast. Repair shop tested the fuel mix and says it is perfect. Visual inspection before start and all looked well. But Air filter bar was improperly installed at factory and vibrated loose during the first 4 hrs. Sucked debris into engine and totaled the cylinder. Given my recent experience with husqvarna warrantee support on another saw, I predict that they will come up with some bogus excuse to not cover it and I'll be out 300 buck here and 700 on my other husqvarna saw.
customer_reviews.author: walkingstick

customer_reviews.title: One of my worst purchases ever!!! (I'd give no stars if I could)
customer_reviews.text: I figured I'd give Husqvarna one more try. An earlier chainsaw of theirs crapped out fairly soon and was continually going to the repair shop. Well this one, a 435, I used ONCE. It worked fine then and now it has completely stopped working. I've spent an hour of sweat and toil tugging at the rope and not even a single pop. DO NOT BUY THIS CHAINSAW. I've heard that Honda's start every time. Husqvarna's don't start at all after the first use. What a nightmare. When you need a chainsaw for fallen trees and yours doesn't work. Indefensible.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Clean Cut, Light weight
customer_reviews.text: This little saw knocks them dead! Cuts dead and down as well as live limbs like a hot knife thru butter. So far only tackled 8in stock, larger jobs ahead and do not anticipate any problems. Runs great 04/04/20 Update: Still love that I have this little saw. Knocked down a small tree, about 15in diameter, works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: wrknstiff

customer_reviews.title: Love this saw
customer_reviews.text: Love this saw, starts easy after it's warmed up just one pull and it's on it's way, for now I've been using the premixed fuel. Saw has plenty of power for my needs-----there is no comparison between this one and my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Walrath

customer_reviews.title: Awesome saw, wrong product description.
customer_reviews.text: Great saw with a ton of power for it's size! The description is misleading as it states this saw has a tool less chain tensioner. This particular model 440e does not have the tool less tensioner, which is not an issue for me but would be for those seeking that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very good saw. It replaces a Husky 435
customer_reviews.text: Very good saw. It replaces a Husky 435. Really easy to start. Cuts like a champ. I sell firewood and this is my go-to saw.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought this saw.........
customer_reviews.text: This saw was a dependable starter for about ten uses and then became hard or impossible to start. It's cumbersome, weighty and it jiggles. It even sounds funny! While using it to cut down trees and saw up branches, if I sat the damn thing down for just a few seconds, it would shut itself off. What a pain in the butt! I've used Stihl in the past with really decent results. Thought a change might be nice. It wasn't! So sorry I blew all this money on such an undependable piece of whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

customer_reviews.title: Carburetor Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: A great working chainsaw for in the yard on the homefront type setting. I have the 16" bar and I am satisfied. My biggest frustration was getting the carburetor in prime tuning. The manual stated the carb was set and ready to use at the factory, but it was not. I had a terrible time in the beginning to get it to start and once started, to idle properly. I adjusted the idler and the (L) (H) and I seem to have a proper idle and nicevtrigger response hitting my rpm. Not a big deal, but I was truly upset when all this was supposed to be done per the manual reading. Other than that, great chainsaw for the DIYer.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Leaking pool of oil
customer_reviews.text: The day after I filled up the oil rez it leaked a pool of oil...I haven't even used it. Garbage and Amazon won't accept a return so now I have to deal with Huqvarna. Last time Husqvarna gets my money.
customer_reviews.author: J-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description but I like this chainsaw.
customer_reviews.text: The description says tool-less but requires a tool. 12/16/2018- I find this chainsaw easy to start which was my top priority so I am changing my rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great product - cuts very well - easy to start
customer_reviews.text: Once you learn the starting tricks (per the instructions - it is super easy to start. The model on Amazon (440e II) does not have no tool chain tension, but c'mon....it ain't that tough - and the the $, this is a fabulous unit. I like the easy to use fuel and oil caps. Overall, the power is great for a 16" bar and the weight is light enough to lug round the property. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: won't start
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it to remove some small trees. It will not start. I followed the instructions and got a small sputter. 30 minutes later nothing. No product support. I will try and return
customer_reviews.author: Steve from MD

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Husqvarna 16 Inch 440e II Gas Chainsaw for a little over a year. I was initially impressed by the work put into the saw the remove vibration and fatigue. I have used only the Husqvarna premixed fuel and Husqvarna bar oil. However, a year later, the saw will not stay running -- it dies after 20-30 minutes. I took it to an authorized repair shop and they stated the compression is low and there is scoring on the cylinder walls. They said it is not cost effective to repair. This saw has less than 15 hours of use, so this answer is pretty unacceptable. Do yourself a favor and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Timber
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light weight saw. Almost scary how easy you can whip it around. I keep cutting down bigger and bigger trees with it, yet to let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good brand saw, works as advertised, recommend to all. Ive used many saws, this has power!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Died already
customer_reviews.text: Not my first chainsaw, but this one died after only 2 uses. Confident the gas ratio was correct and we were using it properly. The biggest issue is....try getting it repaired. On a waiting list at one of the very few mandated repair shops that are in my area, which are all few and far between.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with the mask
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and really goes well with the mask. Got it for my 8 year old as part of a Halloween costume. Kinda heavy but the exercise should burn off some of that candy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband and he is delighted with it
customer_reviews.author: Ermellina U. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Came to me with a chain on backwards
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’m giving it 3 stars because it came to me with the chain on backwards.. I mean come on you’re a chainsaw manufacturer/dealership you should know how to put a chainsaw chain on. Other than that it works fine, cuts good and starts easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst chainsaw I have ever owned. It is nearly impossible to start following their or a local dealers recommended procedure. I have brought it to the local shop 3 times for help in starting it, they've replaced the plug, adjusted carb, etc. Bottom line is it's a piece of garbage and I wish I could return it. Wish I paid attention to ther reviews that said the same thing. Look elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used or refurbished item, incorrectly advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked chain saw this morning, almost looks like this was a returned unit or refurbished. In description it said it comes with 2-cycle oil and there was none in the box.. I have not been able to use the chainsaw as the weather has not been warm enough to get out. Will update once I see the operation of the saw.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the Husqvarna X-Chain system chain saw.
customer_reviews.text: The X-chain system is a joke, for a real wood cutter; it wears out faster then an Oregon replacement chain n' can't be sharpened like one. Plus you can't replace the chain saw X- chain with an Oregon replacement chain.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered thousands of dollars worth of product from Amazon and this is the worst shipment I have ever received
customer_reviews.text: The box that it was shipped in was damaged both inside and outside. When I removed the saw it was inoperable to the point I had to take it apart to fix it. The chain break was stuck in locked position and would not come out. I had to pry the cover off and remove the spring cover to fix it. The handle to the break was not engaged and would not release the chain to cut. The saw had visible signs of being repaired such as scratches on the outside case and black stains on the case. I have ordered thousands of dollars worth of product from Amazon and this is the worst shipment I have ever received.
customer_reviews.author: TooSassy1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little chainsaw I ever had! Once I first start it, I can sit it down for 15 minutes and it starts on one pull all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little saw. Have one to my son for a house warming present since he had a large pile of dead trees on his new lot to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D Day

customer_reviews.title: Cuts and performs excellent
customer_reviews.text: I thought the chainsaw was too heavy for a 16inch saw. Nice fuel and oil caps they work well. Comes with no case.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Broken right out of the box - would not run. Used fresh oil and gas. I am an experienced chain saw user - so I know what I am doing. Customer service line didn't answer. Text messaging referred me to a service repair center to fix this lemon. Neither amazon nor the manufacturer will not accept returns for refund. So, do yourself a favor - do not buy this unit online!!!! Very frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: David Flaxer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Had a bit of trouble getting it started initally - think I flooded it, but just a nice little saw to cut through some limbs, up to about 6 inches in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S D'Amato

customer_reviews.title: Brand new wont even start piece of junk dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Brand new wont start. Useless. Have never bought something brand new that doesnt work. Bought last november didnt try till now. What a fool i am to buy husqvarna...
customer_reviews.author: david j albers

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this saw on 6/1/2020. I purchased the ethanol free “TruFuel” that I use in all my other products (echo, Stihl) with no problems. This machine wouldn’t start right out of the box and hasn’t run yet. I expect a replacement. We will See what they say.
customer_reviews.author: C5driver

customer_reviews.title: Description is a little different.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed it has the power for my jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good Chainsaw....but no oil included like stated
customer_reviews.text: Item description stated that a 2.6 ounce bottle of 2 cycle fuel is included....It was not. That is why I gave it 3 starts. Chainsaw is awesome though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerful saw and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a chain saw to cut firewood for my outdoor fire pit and trim branches/trees. . . I researched many saws and chose this one because of cost and power . . . this saw did not disappoint and I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the 2 cycle oil like the description says.
customer_reviews.author: jiffy66

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one use. Trying to replace but it’s not looking like I have an option without calling customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The unit stopped working after one hour of use. The chain appears to be the issue. the cover and guard shakes badly when using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied my desire to own a chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Used once and it cut with no issues, started easily, and seems to work well. Includes safety feature for chain lock and primer for easy start
customer_reviews.author: M. Strenz

customer_reviews.title: won't start.
customer_reviews.text: This saw socks big time. Can't start it. What a time waster. Now I have to figure out how to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: It’s a chainsaw. But not a 440E. It ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a chainsaw. But not a 440E. It is in fact an E series but not a 440E. Bit misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Husqvarna 16 Inch 440e II Gas Chainsaw
product_meta.description: Second generation lightweight and efficient all-round saw, ideal for those looking for a chainsaw that is exceptionally easy to start and maneuver. Starts easily also with a slower pull, comes with slimmer saw body and flip-up tank caps. Featuring X-Torq engine for lower fuel consumption and reduced emission levels. Equipped with Smart Start, fuel pump and Auto return stop switch for easier starting. Easier handling with tool-less chain tensioner.
feature_bullets: 440E II chainsaw with the new x-cut chain and x-force chainsaw Bar is a lightweight and efficient all-round chainsaw, ideal for the homeowner who wants a reliable workhorse that's simple to use.
2 cycle engine with inertia activated chain brake for safety while operating
Orange Husqvarna chainsaw Bar cover and 2. 6 ounce 2 cycle fuel Included, Bar and chain oil must be purchased Separately
Automatic chain oiler delivers a steady supply of bar and chain oil for safe and effective use
Simple, side-mounted chain tensioning system allows for quick chain adjustments while working
The quick-release air filter facilitates easy cleaning and replacement of the air filter
Husqvarna chainsaw with x-torque lowers fuel consumption and reduces emissions
For safety use with Husqvarna chainsaw chaps, chainsaw gloves and chainsaw helmet
Replacement chainsaw chain, chainsaw case and chainsaw sharpener are available as separate purchases
40. 9cc 16 inch gas chainsaw with guide bar and chain; Idling speed: 2900 rpm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars112 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
